long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension currently allows 2 mouse gestures: back and forward.  Hold right mouse button pressed and move mouse left - that affects as back. Hold right mouse button pressed and move mouse right - that affects as forward. Don't be scared of mouse track - it will disappear when the button is released!
